Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-3727 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-3727 affecting package skopeo for versions less than 1.14.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package skopeo is earlier than 1.14.2-5, affected by CVE-2024-3727
